sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "

In the shown quadrilateral TUVW in the figure, it is given that \(TU = TW \). The bisectors of \(\angle UTV \) and \(\angle VTW \) meet the sides \(UV \) and \(VW \) at the points X and Y respectively. Then prove that XY is parallel to UW .
\newline
tikzpicture{}
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
$$\text{In the triangle $UTV$ , $TX$ is the bisector of $\angle UTV $. So, we can write}$$
\[
	\frac{\input[s1v1]{}\input[s1v2]{} }{XV } = \frac{TU }{TV }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 4, "step_txt": "
$$\text{In the triangle $VTW$ , $TY$ is the bisector of $\angle VTW $. So, we can again write}$$
\[
	\frac{WY }{\input[s2v1]{}\input[s2v2]{} } = \frac{TW }{TV }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{WY }{YV } = \frac{\input[s2v3]{}\input[s2v4]{} }{TV }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
So, from the above two results, we can write
\[
	\frac{UX }{\input[s3v1]{}\input[s3v2]{} } = \frac{WY }{YV }
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now in the triangle UVW, XY is a straight line such that 
\[
	\frac{UX }{XV } = \frac{WY }{YV }
\]
$$\text{That means $XY$ divides two sides of triangle $UVW$ in the same ratio. Which means that $\input[s4v1]{}\input[s4v2]{}$ is parallel to $UW$ .}$$ "}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["U", "X"], "text": "$$\text{Since in the triangle $UTV$, $TX$ is the angle bisector of $\angle UTV$, we can use the angle bisector theorem to write: $\frac{UX }{XV } = \frac{TU }{TV }$}$$"}, {"data": ["Y", "V", "T", "U"], "text": "$$\text{In the triangle VTW, since TY is the angle bisector of $\angle VTW$, we can use the angle bisector theorem to write:}$$
\[
\frac{WY }{YV } = \frac{TW }{TV }
\],$$\text{also, since, $TU = TW$, therefore, $\frac{WY }{YV } = \frac{TU }{TV }$}$$"}, {"data": ["X", "V"], "text": " "}, {"data": ["X", "Y"], "text": "$$\text{From the converse of Thale's theorem, we can prove that $XY$ is parallel to $UW$.}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
